page.title: 12INDUSTRY IN CANFORD MAGNA
page.content: The only industries are farming which is dealt with separately,& sand &grav- el extraction,and the allied dumping of waste.Three sites are used for extraction,two are adjoining,they are to the E.of Arrowsmith Rd.{Whites}are extracting 3000 tons of sand & gravel per day.There are 8 working yrs.left. When refuse tipping started 3yrs ago, it averaged 750 tons per day,it is now 1250 tons per day.The{Drinkwater/Sabey site is extracting sharp sand to be used in building,at the rate of 125- 200 tons per day.The tippage rate is 550m per day,and soil cover etc 300m per day.The sand,gravel,and rubbish,is all transported on and of the site by large tipper trucks.The total area is 3000acres.The third site is owned by {Tarmac Roadstone}it is S.of A341 Moortown Farm.It extracts 2000 tons of gravel per day from a 65 acre site.
